pullrequest.title: Simbody exception when manipulating object twice while paused

content.raw: Adding `world->Step(1);` here will make the test pass.
content.html: Adding world->Step(1); here will make the test pass.

pullrequest.title: Simbody exception when manipulating object twice while paused

content.html:
What do you think about the following:

diff -r 2a6bbd4e368d test/integration/physics_msgs.cc
--- a/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc  Fri Jul 07 15:24:45 2017 -0700
+++ b/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc  Fri Jul 07 15:28:23 2017 -0700
@@ -164,13 +164,9 @@
     }
   }

-  // TODO simbody currently crashes in this test
-  if (_physicsEngine == "simbody")
-  {
-    gzerr << "Skipping part of MoveTool test for Simbody" << std::endl;
-    return;
-  }
-  else
+  // This test block demonstrates issue #2309 titled:
+  // Simbody exception when manipulating object twice while paused
+  // #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/2309
   {
     transport::PublisherPtr userCmdPub =
         this->node->Advertise<msgs::UserCmd>("~/user_cmd");
@@ -195,6 +191,12 @@
       while (*iter != model->GetWorldPose())
       {
         common::Time::MSleep(1);
+        if (_physicsEngine == "simbody")
+        {
+          gzerr << "Relaxing part of MoveTool test for Simbody see issue #2309"
+                << std::endl;
+          world->Step(1);
+        }
       }
       EXPECT_EQ(*iter, model->GetWorldPose());
     }

pullrequest.title: Simbody exception when manipulating object twice while paused

content.raw: I like it. This way it still runs the test albeit with a step.
content.html: I like it. This way it still runs the test albeit with a step.

content.raw: I just wrote this PR to capture the error and gain a little more insight into it. @scpeters what do you think? You mentioned that somebody from Simbody might be able to help. Who should we ask?

pullrequest.title: Simbody exception when manipulating object twice while paused

content.raw: Well, there are other simbody issues in our issue tracker that have more votes. If we decide to make a push on improving simbody support, we can triage the issues at that point and then strategically ask for help.
content.html: Well, there are other simbody issues in our issue tracker that have more votes. If we decide to make a push on improving simbody support, we can triage the issues at that point and then strategically ask for help.

pullrequest.title: Simbody exception when manipulating object twice while paused

content.raw: I think it's ok to merge without a fix. It's better than having the test hiding on a branch somewhere. The main thing is confirming that enabling the test for simbody leads to a failure that matches #2309, which it does.
content.html: I think it's ok to merge without a fix. It's better than having the test hiding on a branch somewhere. The main thing is confirming that enabling the test for simbody leads to a failure that matches #2309, which it does.
